#end ))) #end #end ## ===================================================================== ## ## SECTIONS DISPLAY ## ## #macro(__reportSection_display $sectionName) #set($cleanSectionName = $sectionName) #set($cleanSectionName = $cleanSectionName.replace('-', '_')) #evaluate("#__reportSection__${cleanSectionName}()") #end ## ("$!activeFields.contains('age_of_onset')" != 'false') ---- #__displayIfNotEmpty('age_of_onset') #end (% class="clear" %)((())) #__displayIfNotEmpty('indication_for_referral') )))##chapter #end ## $config.getProperty('section__measurements').value.contains($targetClassName) && ($xcontext.action == 'edit' || $doc.getObject($targetClassName))) (% class="clear measurement-info chapter" %)((( == %)Show(%%) (% class="tool hide" %)Hide(%%) ))) (% id="charts"%)((( #set($chartOptions = {'targetClassName' : $targetClassName, 'obj': $obj, 'link': true}) #_measurementCharts($chartOptions) )))##charts ))) (% class="clear"%)((())) #end #else #__measurements_displayCompact() #end )))##chapter #end #end ## ================================================================= ## Phenotype information ## #macro(__reportSection__phenotype_info) #if ($xcontext.action == 'edit' || "$doc.display('unaffected')$doc.display('phenotype')$doc.display('negative_phenotype')" != '') #if $doc.display('prenatal_phenotype') (% class="clear" %)(((----))) (((#__displayIfNotEmpty('prenatal_comments')))) )))##chapter #end #end ## ================================================================= ## Family history ## #macro(__reportSection__family_history) #if (("$!activeFields.contains('consanguinity')" != 'false' || "$!activeFields.contains('miscarriages')" != 'false'|| "$!activeFields.contains('mode_of_inheritance')" != 'false' || "$!activeFields.contains('pedigree')" != 'false') && ($xcontext.action == 'edit' || "$doc.display('consanguinity')$doc.display('miscarriages')$doc.display('mode_of_inheritance')$doc.display('family_comments')$doc.display('pedigree')" != '')) (% class="clear clinical-info family_history-info chapter #__markIfMandatory('family_history')" %)((( == $!{class.get('family_history').prettyName} == ((( $doc.display('consanguinity')## $doc.display('miscarriages') #__displayIfNotEmpty('mode_of_inheritance') #__displayIfNotEmpty('family_comments') #set ($pedigreeObj = $doc.getObject('PhenoTips.PedigreeClass')) #if ($pedigreeObj) #set ($data = $!pedigreeObj.getProperty('data').value) #set ($image = $pedigreeObj.getProperty('image').value) #end## pedigree obj exists #if ($xcontext.action == 'edit' || "$!{doc.display('pedigree')}" != '' || "$!data" != '') === Pedigree === $!doc.display('pedigree') #if ($xcontext.action == 'edit') #if ("$!data" != '') #set ($pAction = 'Edit pedigree') #else #set ($pAction = 'Draw pedigree') #end## pedigree data exists (% class="buttonwrapper" %)[[$!{pAction}>>||queryString="sheet=PhenoTips.PedigreeEditor" rel="__blank" class="button" id="pedigree-trigger"]] #end## action == edit #if ("$!image" != '') {{html clean="false"}} $!image {{/html}} #end #end## action == edit || data ))) )))##chapter #end## if #end ## ================================================================= ## Medical history ## #macro(__reportSection__medical_history) #if ("$!activeFields.contains('medical_developmental_history')" != 'false' && ($xcontext.action == 'edit' || "$doc.display('medical_developmental_history')$doc.display('reports_history')" != '')) (% class="clear clinical-info medical_history-info chapter #__markIfMandatory('medical_history')" %)((( == $!{class.get('medical_developmental_history').prettyName} == ((( #__displayIfNotEmpty('medical_developmental_history') #if ($xcontext.action != 'export' && "$doc.display('reports_history')" != '') === Previous medical reports === $doc.display('reports_history') #end ))) )))##chapter #end #end ## ================================================================= ## Diagnosis information ## class="clear chapter" %)((( ##(% class="diagnosis-info"%)((( == Diagnosis == #__displayIfNotEmpty2Col('omim_id' '' '' '') (% class="clear" %)(((#__displayIfNotEmpty('comments')))) ##))) #__ncbiSBox("$!{class.name}_$!{obj.number}_phenotype" '') (% class="clear" %)((())) )))##chapter #end #end ## ================================================================= ## Variants information 'propertyName' : 'type', 'propertyValue' : 'molecular'}) ))) )))##chapter #end #end ## ================================================================= ## More information
